description: Gets the capacity assignment configuration for a capacity reservation, if one exists.

parameters.name: CapacityReservationName
parameters.description: The name of the capacity reservation to retrieve the capacity assignment configuration for.

nested_items.name: CapacityAssignmentConfiguration
nested_items.description: The requested capacity assignment configuration for the specified capacity reservation.

nested_items.name: CapacityReservationName
nested_items.description: The name of the reservation that the capacity assignment configuration is for.

nested_items.name: CapacityAssignments
nested_items.description: The list of assignments that make up the capacity assignment configuration.

nested_items.name: WorkGroupNames
nested_items.description: The list of workgroup names for the capacity assignment.
